hexmapping.page.marker_actions.create_ma: Creates a new Circle Marker with the provided $(thing)Unique ID$(), $(thing)label$(), $(thing)position$(), and $(thing)radius$()
Creates a new Rectangle Marker with the provided $(thing)Unique ID$(), $(thing)label$(), $(thing)top corner$(), and $(thing)bottom corner$()
Creates a new Polygon Marker with the provided $(thing)Unique ID$(), $(thing)label$(), and $(thing)list of positions$()
Creates a new Polygon Marker with the provided $(thing)Unique ID$(), $(thing)label$(), and $(thing)list of positions$() OR a reference to a $(thing)Hexical Mesh Entity$()
Creates a new Polyline Marker with the provided $(thing)Unique ID$(), $(thing)label$(), and $(thing)list of positions$()
Creates a new Polyline Marker with the provided $(thing)Unique ID$(), $(thing)label$(), and $(thing)list of positions$() OR a reference to a $(thing)Hexical Mesh Entity$()
Creates a new Icon Marker with the provided $(thing)Unique ID$(), $(thing)label$(), $(thing)icon$(), and $(thing)position$()
hexmapping.page.marker_actions.set_fill_: Sets the Fill Color of a marker, if applicable (Circle, Rectangle, and Polygon)
hexmapping.page.marker_actions.set_line_: Sets the Line Color of a marker, if applicable (Circle, Rectangle, Polyline, and Polygon)
Sets the Line Weight of a marker, if applicable (Circle, Rectangle, Polyline, and Polygon)
hexmapping.page.marker_actions.has_marke: Checks if a marker exists on the $(thing)map$() under the provided $(thing)marker ID$()
hexmapping.page.marker_spells.set_marker: Adds the provided marker to the $(thing)map$() under the provided $(thing)marker ID$()
hexmapping.page.marker_spells.remove_mar: Removed the marker on the $(thing)map$() under the provided $(thing)marker ID$()
hexcasting.page.markers.info: I have made a discovery, we are being observed...$(br)I am starting to experiment with altering $(italic)their$() perspectives by marking their "$(thing)Maps$()" to obscure their scrying...
hexcasting.page.markers.missing: Oh, huh... Seems you are missing any map mod that we have integration for...$(br2)Here are the existing integrations:$(li)$(l:https://modrinth.com/plugin/bluemap)Bluemap$(/l)$(li)$(l:https://modrinth.com/plugin/dynmap)Dynmap$(/l)$(li)$(l:https://modrinth.com/plugin/pl3xmap)Pl3xmap$(/l)$(li)$(l:https://modrinth.com/plugin/squaremap)Squaremap$(/l)
hexmapping.page.markers.get_maps.bluemap: Pushes a list of $(thing)Maps$() from Bluemap to the stack
hexmapping.page.markers.get_maps.dynmap: Pushes a list of $(thing)Maps$() from Dynmap to the stack
hexmapping.page.markers.get_maps.pl3xmap: Pushes a list of $(thing)Maps$() from Pl3xmap to the stack
hexmapping.page.markers.get_maps.squarem: Pushes a list of $(thing)Maps$() from Squaremap to the stack

hexmapping.mishap.marker.unrecognized: This marker has no direct translation to %s markers
hexmapping.mishap.no_integration: This map iota is for %s mod but it is not installed
